heading: HR00062
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE NATIONAL LABOR RELATIONS COMMISSION TO PROVIDE IN ITS RULES OF PROCEDURE, THE EXECUTION OR PRESENTATION AS EVIDENCE OF FOREIGN JUDGMENTS ON CONTRACTUAL RIGHTS OF OUR OVERSEAS FILIPINO WORKERS, WITHOUT NEED OR ORDER FROM OUR REGULAR COURTS, IN THE INTEREST OF SPEEDY JUSTICE AS HIGHER STANDARD OF PROTECTION AND PROMOTION OF THE RIGHTS OF THE OVERSEAS FILIPINO WORKERS
status: Pending with the Committee on OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS since 2016-07-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00062
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE NATIONAL LABOR RELATIONS COMMISSION TO PROVIDE IN ITS RULES OF PROCEDURE, THE EXECUTION OR PRESENTATION AS EVIDENCE OF FOREIGN JUDGMENTS ON CONTRACTUAL RIGHTS OF OUR OVERSEAS FILIPINO WORKERS, WITHOUT NEED OR ORDER FROM OUR REGULAR COURTS, IN THE INTEREST OF SPEEDY JUSTICE AS HIGHER STANDARD OF PROTECTION AND PROMOTION OF THE RIGHTS OF THE OVERSEAS FILIPINO WORKERS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BERTIZ, ANICETO "JOHN" III D.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-07
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS ON 2016-07-27
